results.title: Down to earth
results.creator_credit: Robert Lattanzio and Corporation for Community Television
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Earth revealed”.
This episode introduces the vast field of geology and the work undertaken by scientists in that and other related fields. Excellent visuals stimulate the viewer’s appreciation of the Earth and a broad overview is provided on Plate Tectonics, earthquakes, seismology and the origins of our planet.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Lattanzio and Corporation for Community Television

results.title: Down through the years: a random view of Montreal
results.creator_credit: Jacques Giraldeau, Victor Jobin, Marcel Martin and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A poetic view of Montreal. To the rhythm of excerpts from ‘Jazz Sebastian Bach’ by the Swingle Singers - a vocal group from France - the camera explores the old city and the new. In the city modern skyscrapers mushroom skywards, but all around are ancient streets and monuments jealously guarding the memories of another time: including Bonsecours Church, La Place Royal, Le Theatre des Saltimbanques and Dickens Street.
results.title_for_label: Down through the years: a random view of Montreal
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jacques Giraldeau, Victor Jobin, Marcel Martin and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: A poetic view of Montreal. To the rhythm of excerpts from ‘Jazz Sebastian Bach’ by the Swingle Singers - a vocal group from France - the camera explores the old city and the new. In the city modern skyscrapers mushroom skywards, but all around are ancient streets and monuments jealously guarding the memories of another time: including Bonsecours Church, La Place Royal, Le Theatre des Saltimbanques and Dickens Street.

results.title: Down there = alli abajo (Spanish version)
results.brief_description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.
results.description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. results.title: Down There (Serbian Version)
results.brief_description: A program about women’s bodies - reproduction, preventative health care and contraception. Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, it breaks down the myths, dispels the fears and misinformation by presenting easy-to-understand information about women’s bodies and how they work.
